div.div:
June 17, 2012 - Motorola Droid 3 with version 3.1.8
More info than I could learn in two lifetimes.
Well worth the $4,a 'must have' for any player.To respond to other comments I'd say 1,go to settings and have your screen not time out,2,metronome and tuner apps are free and very reliable,look em up.I'd like to see a app with guitar licks,that'd be every bit as useful as this one,wish I knew how to write code.One thing I'd like to see on this app would be a arpeggio finder like the chord finder,e.g. tap in notes for a arpeggio then have the app tell me which one I'm playing.

Mikju@gmail.com - June 8, 2012 - Version 3.1.8
Great
Great app,but after saving say your chords on all chords you should be able to import to gtrs ref,only logical,have to start again.and why,have you wasted half the screen? All chds layout better,may have to update.

Graham - June 16, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 3.1.8
Great now!
Latest update has fixed the layout issues I was having. Thanks. HTC Sensation.

Echoshill - June 24, 2012 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 3.1.8
Changed to two stars
Too many errors in arpeggios to list. Take a look at m7b5 for example.

lanky - June 23, 2012 - HTC One X with version 3.1.8
Great
:..:..........................%$$%& really good app

Robert - May 27, 2012 - Motorola Droid II with version 3.1.6
Awesome
Great on a DROID2

Gordon - February 12, 2012 - Samsung Europa with version 3.1.5
Awesome ap
Quite simply everything a guitarist needs to learn more about chords and scales. I love the chord quiz, and alt. tuning mode is fantastic. Very well thought out app - 5 stars!!!

ariel - December 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.1.5
That's better
Fixed GUI on galaxy note. Good update. Thanks!!

Laura - February 18, 2012 - HTC Wildfire with version 3.1.5
A must have
Absolutely great, comprehensive reference tool! Indispensable - Big thanks to dev :)

Stephen - May 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 3.1.5
Galaxy note
Compared to "Chord" this is compete crap!

michael - April 13, 2012 - Samsung Droid Charge with version 3.1.5
Sweet Application
Easy to use and intuitive.

John - March 8, 2012 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 3.1.5
Perfect
Best guitar reference app I've ever seen.

Chris - February 23, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 3.1.5
Almost great
Great app :D It'd be great if I you could group favorite chords

DRG - January 9, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 3.1.5
Perfect!
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

T. - January 1, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 3.1.4
Perfect
What more could you ask for in a reference app? Well alot maybe, but that's not the point. The point is, this app is definitely a go-to for any guitar player. Must have.

Cisco - October 14, 2011 - Version 3.1.1
James G. : Guitarist Reference
This is an excellent tool for the self taught accomplished musician. An excellent tool for bassists too!

Cerikito - December 12, 2011 - Version 3.1.1
Good app but...
For a paid app I would expect much more, like : 1. a Prevent-screen-from-going-to-sleep-mode button visible on every page? This is sooo needed! 2. sound for chords and scales! How come there's none? 3. a good metronome (one you can play with screen off so the battery doesn't melt when you just need a metronome)... 4. a less tedious way to find a specific chord, I wish it was more user friendly. That's some BIG flows but this app is good nonetheless, however it's more for advanced users than for beginners.

Jeff - December 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 3.1.1
Now with Android 4.0!!!
Working with Android 4.0. Working great on my galaxy nexus now. Thanks for the quick turnaround. This is an awesome app.

Marlina - June 7, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 3.1.1
Good app, but is it missing chords/fingerings?
How about regular ol' diminished and sus chords (not just dim 7ths and sus 2s). I'm sure they're probably there, but under a different name. Kinda wish it would say if a chord has an alternate name. That way I don't have to look it up online.

Madner - September 22, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 3.1.1
Now that screen is fixed best guitar application ever!!!!

C. Earl - December 8, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 3.1.1
Yup
The only thing to make this app any better would be a tuner

mark - December 20, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 3.1.1
Great APP for the working guitarist

Mark - September 13, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 3.0.7
I would give 5 stars if the chord dictionary included open tunings. Otherwise, the ...
I would give 5 stars if the chord dictionary included open tunings. Otherwise, the app is only partially useful.

July 26, 2011 - Motorola Flipout with version 3.0.7
Very useful application. I only wish the developers add better screen ...
Very useful application. I only wish the developers add better screen support-resizing. It is a pain to use on my 2.8" smartphone (android 2.1).

Deborah - June 12, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 3.0.7
1st, down loaded Demo. It impressed me so much I purchased the full app. ...
1st, down loaded Demo. It impressed me so much I purchased the full app. I am only deleting Demo because I have full app to use as I practice guitar

Revmixman - July 4, 2011 - Version 3.0.7
Needs to scale full screen for tablets

Hunter X - August 3, 2011 - Samsung Nexus S with version 3.0.7
Brilliant

Alvin - April 7, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 3.0.6
Does what it says it does plus more. Love it!

Charles - May 24, 2011 - Version 3.0.6
Overly complicated for every day use. When selecting C chord one is presented with ...
Overly complicated for every day use. When selecting C chord one is presented with 102 possible matching scales. 62 chords listed for C maj scale.

Peter - April 29, 2011 - Version 3.0.6
Won't save custom tunnings. When you add a favorite it won't remember what tunnings ...
Won't save custom tunnings. When you add a favorite it won't remember what tunnings you I use 4 different tunnings. Also no 7 string option

Patrick - May 8, 2011 - Version 3.0.6
If you want to brush up on your theory, this app is for you. ...
If you want to brush up on your theory, this app is for you. I use it every day ! Great job!

pinkblob - April 13, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 3.0.6
F# maj7 chord shows e#?

Brian - June 3, 2011 - Samsung Moment with version 3.0.6
Still force closes ever time i open, please fix,

John - April 10, 2011 - Version 3.0.5
One of the best refrences i've used up to date.its like a portable encyclopedia

Rich Rath - March 24, 2011 - Version 3.0.5
Close but not quite. Liked the fact that alt tunings are supported BUT not ...
Close but not quite. Liked the fact that alt tunings are supported BUT not for finding chords :-( would probably be a 5 with that.

Christian - March 22, 2011 - Version 3.0.5
Great app but with no sounds? What is the point? Jam box was free ...
Great app but with no sounds? What is the point? Jam box was free and sounds great

Rex - March 23, 2011 - Version 3.0.5
Really useful. Wicked chord quiz...makes you work them out. Excellent app!

rockerbilly - February 28, 2011 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 3.0.4
I love this. Just for quick scale reference alone! Every thing else is a ...
I love this. Just for quick scale reference alone! Every thing else is a awesome bonus!

Andy - March 3, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 3.0.4
Seriously. How am I supposed to use this to practice scales if it goes ...
Seriously. How am I supposed to use this to practice scales if it goes to sleep. Everything else great, but I chose the refund.

lenny - February 23, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 3.0.4
Best app for guitar by a mile!! Verry useful, especialy when transposing in ...
Best app for guitar by a mile!! Verry useful, especialy when transposing in alternate tunings!!

Dominic - February 22, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 3.0.2
Perfect app for a serious guitar player...

Dan - February 13, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 3.0.1
Options like view favourite and favourite should be in a menu by pressing the ...
Options like view favourite and favourite should be in a menu by pressing the menu button. Still a design failure and a good reference.

STAR+ - February 4, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 3.0.0
LOVE this app... great updates. Been self taught by this app and playing daily. ...
LOVE this app... great updates. Been self taught by this app and playing daily. Thanks a MILLION! Would pay more! Just needs in app sounds to perfect!

Eric - February 3, 2011 - Version 3.0.0
Awesome UI improvements. Needs to play chord tones.

Steven - February 3, 2011 - HTC Droid Eris with version 3.0.0
handy and easy to use! great interface.

tekrytor - February 4, 2011 - HTC G1 with version 3.0.0
Best guitar chord and scale reference for Android! Lots of tunings. For a 6th ...
Best guitar chord and scale reference for Android! Lots of tunings. For a 6th star, give me 7-string option!

Nick - February 20, 2011 - Version 3.0.0
Not having to connect to to internet to listen to scales and stuff would ...
Not having to connect to to internet to listen to scales and stuff would be really nice. Also, I don't hate the UI but it would look nice minimalist.

Justin - February 3, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 3.0.0
Layout is sooo much better now

Gary - November 21, 2010 - Version 2.4.22
Limited. Has to connect to an external site to play the sound bites, and ...
Limited. Has to connect to an external site to play the sound bites, and isn't always successful Aside from that not a bad reference.

robert - September 17, 2010 - Version 2.4.22
Good utility for guitarists, but the user interface needs looking at since not very ...
Good utility for guitarists, but the user interface needs looking at since not very intuitive and doesn't fill the screen of my dell streak

Tim - July 31, 2010 - HTC Droid Eris with version 2.4.22
Best guitar reference available for a phone. Includes recommended chords for ...
Best guitar reference available for a phone. Includes recommended chords for whatever key you want. Excellent.

Tom - August 16, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.4.22
Chord sounds going to outside site does not work. Same with scales. Would rate ...
Chord sounds going to outside site does not work. Same with scales. Would rate 5 stars if this worked. Moto 'Droid.

Hicks - September 25, 2010 - LG Ally with version 2.4.22
Keeps going blank. A good tool if will stay loaded.

James - November 25, 2010 - Version 2.4.22
Good resource. Need better way to play audio. Kicks out of current screen & ...
Good resource. Need better way to play audio. Kicks out of current screen & returns to main menu.

QWERTY - August 2, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.4.22
Glad I got the refund because h not adverting up front we need to ...
Glad I got the refund because h not adverting up front we need to suck our bandwidth to play samples is insane.

dylan - November 30, 2010 - Version 2.4.22
Sick. Its accurate & gives alot of options. I've played a long time & ...
Sick. Its accurate & gives alot of options. I've played a long time & lots of genres but this thing speeds up writing. I don't use the audio part much

Terence - February 3, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4.22
Luv the UI change...great job

taylor - February 9, 2011 - Version 2.4.22
Would love it more if it would go all the way to the 24th ...
Would love it more if it would go all the way to the 24th fret instead of just to the 15th

Rick - June 28, 2010 - Version 2.4.22
Can't wait that long to hear samples...sorry.

Mike - August 7, 2010 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.4.22
Refunded, ui bad, network for audio bad

justin - June 5, 2010 - Version 2.4.21
The interface is unattractive, and there are only about 30 alternate tunings, when ...
The interface is unattractive, and there are only about 30 alternate tunings, when 100 are advertised. Not a big deal though. Other than that its good

Andrew - May 30, 2010 - Motorola Atrix with version 2.4.21
I love this! My biggest complaint is the lack of certain advanced search functions. ...
I love this! My biggest complaint is the lack of certain advanced search functions. The UI also makes it look like a toy. Otherwise great!

Kris - June 5, 2010 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 2.4.21
Pretty nice app. Interface could use an update and it doesn't scale correctly on ...
Pretty nice app. Interface could use an update and it doesn't scale correctly on the big screen of the EVO 4G.

Oddysey - June 9, 2010 - Version 2.4.21
Just need a list of chords for keys and it would be perfect.

chris - June 2, 2010 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 2.4.20
I'm a professional player. This is a convenient, valuable tool on the go at ...
I'm a professional player. This is a convenient, valuable tool on the go at gigs or studio work. Great app

james - May 3, 2011 - HTC Droid Eris with version 2.4.19
This thing is ok it is probably better if it would it were free

Taylor - May 14, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.4.19
Wonderful app, works great, especially since i am a guitar teacher! Some great ...
Wonderful app, works great, especially since i am a guitar teacher! Some great features as well. Absolutly great! G1

sang - March 19, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.4.18
This is a really great app. But the size is way too heavy, and ...
This is a really great app. But the size is way too heavy, and the graphic and UI look out dated. Lighter simpler design would be 5 stars.

James - March 8, 2010 - Version 2.4.18
Could do with a lot of work I don't see the difference after updates

bobby - February 28, 2010 - Version 2.4.17
Has a lot of potential but needs better interface and sounds on the app ...
Has a lot of potential but needs better interface and sounds on the app not a sample off internet.. uninstalled. Have to many guitar apps already

James - February 28, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.4.17
Ugly as sin user interface and extremely stupid to have to connect to a ...
Ugly as sin user interface and extremely stupid to have to connect to a separate website to hear a chord!

mike - February 27, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4.16
Pretty good app. It's a solid reference. Wish the dev would tell u what ...
Pretty good app. It's a solid reference. Wish the dev would tell u what the update is. Way too many updates to not tell us.

nate - February 21, 2010 - Version 2.4.16
Deff one of the best apps for a guitarist. Must have ridicously helped, dont ...
Deff one of the best apps for a guitarist. Must have ridicously helped, dont understand why so many are crying about the interface its not to bad

Mark - February 14, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4.15
The must have app for any one playing a guitar. This app has it ...
The must have app for any one playing a guitar. This app has it all and its easy to use. Just wish you could strum to hear the cords.

Adrian - February 14, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4.15
Very useful, would be even better if it had the circle of fifths in ...
Very useful, would be even better if it had the circle of fifths in there.

Zeb - March 9, 2010 - Version 2.4.15
When you release an update, it would be nice if the update details were ...
When you release an update, it would be nice if the update details were listed on the site, or a link to update details was posted.

webslurn - January 24, 2010 - Version 2.4.7
Good app in desperate need of ability to play strings. Developer: look at Robotic ...
Good app in desperate need of ability to play strings. Developer: look at Robotic Guitarist for inspiration. Also better if had default android look.

Jordan - January 25, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.4.13
The best chord dictionary I've found, but the interface is pretty bad and the ...
The best chord dictionary I've found, but the interface is pretty bad and the design is so ugly it's embarrassing to have on my phone. Uninstalled.

Patrick - November 2, 2009 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4.3
Great app. One thing that needs an update is the audio files. Its so ...
Great app. One thing that needs an update is the audio files. Its so annoying that you have to go on the web browser every time you listen to a chord.

Mike - January 12, 2010 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4.11
Great app. Would really like to see voicings for Gr, Fr, and It +6 ...
Great app. Would really like to see voicings for Gr, Fr, and It +6 chords where you could select the key then the variation.

chris - August 31, 2009 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.0.4
Please update with more frets!! Would help me on so many levels, still an ...
Please update with more frets!! Would help me on so many levels, still an amazing app though.

cole - August 12, 2009 - HTC Desire HD with version 1.0
Great tool, hopefully planning to show all frets soon

Mark - October 20, 2009 - Version 2.4.1
Great app for musicians,would be perfect if it had chords for alternative tunings

Joel - November 17, 2009 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.4.5
Nice app with a ton of info. Some functions are a tad slow, but ...
Nice app with a ton of info. Some functions are a tad slow, but good overall.

a - October 14, 2009 - Version 2.4
Amazing!! Would love if it had the chord dictionary anx other features for all ...
Amazing!! Would love if it had the chord dictionary anx other features for all tunings though. Other than that just great!!!

John - January 19, 2010 - HTC Nexus One with version 2.4.12
Clunky interface with many slowdowns.

Keith - January 28, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.4.14
I have this app for my iTouch. I love this app....if u are a ...
I have this app for my iTouch. I love this app....if u are a seasoned guitarist like me or a noob......u need this program

Robert - October 29, 2009 - Version 2.4.3
awesome. .. love it

I am more into keyboards than guitars but still find this program fun and ...
I am more into keyboards than guitars but still find this program fun and useful. *****

rick - October 15, 2009 - Version 2.4.1
Coolest app in the history of mankind

Joseph - February 7, 2010 - Version 2.4
Is there any way you could come up with an extra page with the ...
Is there any way you could come up with an extra page with the Circle of Fifths for the advanced players...would help alot! Thanks!

Antonio - January 12, 2010 - Version 2.4.7
Bought it with a complain. No way having two wait 15 secs to hear ...
Bought it with a complain. No way having two wait 15 secs to hear a chord play.

Bob - January 25, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.4.13
I love it I loveit I love it.

Rob - February 27, 2010 - Version 2.4.10
Use it almost every day. Can't play sounds natively?

Mo - October 12, 2009 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 2.4
Okay. So E is root. On 12th. E is root. The pattern will be ...
Okay. So E is root. On 12th. E is root. The pattern will be the same. No need for 24 frets displayes

Its awesome!
